misc: Originally known to many Hector players from his past appearances in Finnkampen events
biography: Jari, a new face to the Hector Trophée, hails from the esteemed Archipelagia Golf Club. While this marks Jari's inaugural appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, his name is already familiar to many within the golfing community, largely due to his past participation in Finnkampen events.

Although considered as retired from Hector events, Jari's dedication to the sport is undeniable. His presence promises a fresh dynamic to the competition, and spectators are keen to witness how his experience translates onto this new stage.
